bug.author: coolmian
bug.summary: can not start a executor from mwu.yml
bug.description:
Describe the bug 在文档的描述中 <denchmark-link:https://docs.jina.ai/chapters/extend/mwu.html>https://docs.jina.ai/chapters/extend/mwu.html</denchmark-link>
使用了错误的文件名mwu.py，它与mwu.yml中的 py_modules参数的值“mwu_encoder.py”不匹配。 否则会报错： dummyEncoder@26419[C]:can not start a executor from mwu.yml dummyEncoder@26419[S]:terminated dummyEncoder@26415[C]:fail to start <class 'jina.peapods.pea.BasePea'> with name dummyEncoder Describe how you solve it 解决办法就是修改mwu.yml中的参数或者修改文件名使其相匹配。 <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
Environment Screenshots <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36444522/85942936-535f2f00-b95f-11ea-842c-46216caf2329.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: 感谢您的错误报告@coolmian-我们的团队将进行调查并尽快与您联系！ (Thanks for you bug report <denchmark-link:https://github.com/coolmian>@coolmian</denchmark-link> - our team will look into it and get back to you shortly!)
I believe OP already points out the solution. Could you <denchmark-link:https://github.com/coolmian>@coolmian</denchmark-link> please make a pull request? Greatly appreciated!

I believe OP already points out the solution. Could you @coolmian please make a pull request? Greatly appreciated!
Sure, I've read it CONTRIBUTING.md. Should I operate in this (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/docs.git>https://github.com/jina-ai/docs.git</denchmark-link> ) repository?

No, the repo docs is built and auto updated on every CD. You change the source of the docs directly from here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/jina/tree/master/docs>https://github.com/jina-ai/jina/tree/master/docs</denchmark-link>

No, the repo docs is built and auto updated on every CD. You change the source of the docs directly from here: https://github.com/jina-ai/jina/tree/master/docs
Thank you for your explanation. I have sent a pull request
